did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: Inauguration of Homer LeRoy Shantz as President of the University of Arizona, April 24, 1930
did.abstract: This collection pertains to the inauguration of Homer LeRoy Shantz as president of The University of Arizona in 1930. Materials include programs from the inauguration, and letters of congratulations from individuals, American and foreign institutions.

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.

prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: Inauguration of Homer LeRoy Shantz as President of the University of Arizona (AZ 048). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: H. L. Shantz was president of The University of Arizona, 1928-1936.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is organized into volumes by subject.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: v.1. Inauguration programs. -- v.2. Letters from individuals in Arizona and elsewhere. -- v.3. Letters from American institutions. -- v.4. Letters from foreign institutions, index -- Box: Miscellaneous letters and folders of congratulations and acceptance.
